snippet: The Interior Ministry said Wednesday that it would allow no more than 80 migrants a day to apply for asylum at southern border crossing points.
abstract: Austrian government will permit no more than 80 migrants daily to apply for asylum at its southern border crossing points.
lead_paragraph: The Interior Ministry said Wednesday that it would allow no more than 80 migrants a day to apply for asylum at southern border crossing points.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Austria: Limits on Migrants Imposed

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
